creditline: Gift of funds from Darwin and Geri Reedy
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: female figurine kneeling with arms hanging free of the body; large mirrored abdominal container; glass eyes; furrowed coiffure; reddish brown with an encrusted surface and areas of glossy black patina; traces of blue pigment on chest
dimension: 6 x 2 3/16 x 2 3/4 in. (15.24 x 5.56 x 6.99 cm) (including attached base)
medium: Wood, glass, metal, pigment, other materials
title: Female Power Figure
